short-title.#text:
Minuteman Missile National
			 Historic Site Boundary Modification Act

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 3(a) of
			 the Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a
Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:3, 4
Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:4, 5
Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
,
				the historic site shall include a visitor facility and administrative site
				located on the parcel of land described in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:2
Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:3/sp:B

text.#text: In addition to the components described in

term.#text:
Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Boundary
				Modification

text.#text:
approximately 25
				acres of land within the Buffalo Gap National Grassland, located north of exit
				131 on Interstate 90 in Jackson County, South Dakota, as generally depicted on
				the map entitled

approximately
				3.65 acres of land located at the Delta 1 Launch Control Facility for the
				construction and use of a parking lot and for other administrative uses.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:3/sp:A

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall
				be kept on file and available for public inspection in the appropriate offices
				of the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:3/sp:B
Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:3/sp:B

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, to be administered as part of the historic
				site.

text.#text:
Administrative jurisdiction over the
				land described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1999/s:3/ss:a/p:3/sp:D

text.#text:
The boundaries of the Buffalo Gap National Grassland
				are modified to exclude the land transferred under

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To modify the boundary of the Minuteman Missile National
		  Historic Site in the State of South Dakota, and for other
		  purposes.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Energy and
			 Natural Resources

) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and
